nappo.core.storage package¶

Submodules¶

nappo.core.storage.hindsight_experience_replay_buffer module¶

class nappo.core.storage.hindsight_experience_replay_buffer.HindsightExperienceReplayBuffer(size, device, her_function=<function HindsightExperienceReplayBuffer.<lambda>>)¶

Bases: object

Storage class for Off-Policy algorithms using HER (https://arxiv.org/abs/1707.01495).

sizeint

Storage capacity along time axis.

device: torch.device

CPU or specific GPU where data tensors will be placed and class computations will take place. Should be the same device where the actor critic model is located.

her_functionfunc

Function to update obs, rhs, obs2 and rew according to HER paper.

off_policy_data_fieldstuple

Accepted data fields. If the samples inserted contain other fields, an AssertionError will be raised.

max_sizeint

Storage capacity along time axis.

device: torch.device

CPU or specific GPU where data tensors will be placed and class computations will take place.

her_functionfunc

Function to update obs, rhs, obs2 and rew according to HER paper.

add_data(new_data)¶

Appends new_data to currently stored data.

new_datadict

Dictionary of env transition samples to be added to self.data.

after_update()¶

Steps required after updating actor policy model

before_update(actor_critic, algo)¶

Steps required before updating actor policy model.

actor_criticnn.Module

An actor_critic class instance.

algoan algorithm class

An algorithm class instance.

generate_batches(num_mini_batch, mini_batch_size, num_epochs=1, recurrent_ac=False)¶

Returns a batch iterator to update actor critic.

num_mini_batchint

Number mini batches per epoch.

mini_batch_sizeint

Number of samples contained in each mini batch.

num_epochsint

Number of epochs.

recurrent_acbool

Whether actor critic policy is a RNN or not.

shufflebool

Whether to shuffle collected data or generate sequential

batchdict

Generated data batches.

get_data()¶

Return currently stored data.

init_tensors(sample)¶

Lazy initialization of data tensors from a sample.

sampledict

Data sample (containing all tensors of an environment transition)

insert(sample)¶

Store new transition sample.

sampledict

Data sample (containing all tensors of an environment transition)

off_policy_data_fields = ('obs', 'obs2', 'rhs', 'act', 'rew', 'done')¶
reset()¶

Set class counters to zero and remove stored data

classmethod storage_factory(size, her_function=<function HindsightExperienceReplayBuffer.<lambda>>)¶

Returns a function that creates HindsightExperienceReplayBuffer instances.

sizeint

Storage capacity along time axis.

create_buffer_instancefunc

creates a new OnPolicyBuffer class instance.

nappo.core.storage.on_policy_buffer module¶

class nappo.core.storage.on_policy_buffer.OnPolicyBuffer(size, device=device(type='cpu'))¶

Bases: object

Storage class for On-Policy algorithms.

sizeint

Storage capacity along time axis.

device: torch.device

CPU or specific GPU where data tensors will be placed and class computations will take place. Should be the same device where the actor critic model is located.

on_policy_data_fieldstuple

Accepted data fields. If the samples inserted contain other fields, an AssertionError will be raised.

max_sizeint

Storage capacity along time axis.

device: torch.device

CPU or specific GPU where data tensors will be placed and class computations will take place.

add_data(new_data)¶

Replace currently stored data.

new_datadict

Dictionary of env transition samples to replace self.data with.

after_update()¶

After updating actor policy model, make sure self.step is at 0.

before_update(actor_critic, algo)¶

Before updating actor policy model, compute returns and advantages.

actor_criticnn.Module

An actor_critic class instance.

algoan algorithm class

An algorithm class instance.

compute_advantages()¶

Compute transition advantage values.

compute_returns(gamma)¶

Compute return values.

gammafloat

Algorithm discount factor parameter.

nappo.core.storage.on_policy_gae_buffer module¶

class nappo.core.storage.on_policy_gae_buffer.OnPolicyGAEBuffer(size, gae_lambda=0.95, device=device(type='cpu'))¶

Bases: nappo.core.storage.on_policy_buffer.OnPolicyBuffer

Storage class for On-Policy algorithms with Generalized Advantage Estimator (GAE). https://arxiv.org/abs/1506.02438

sizeint

Storage capacity along time axis.

gae_lambdafloat

GAE lambda parameter.

device: torch.device

CPU or specific GPU where data tensors will be placed and class computations will take place. Should be the same device where the actor critic model is located.

on_policy_data_fieldstuple

Accepted data fields. If the samples inserted contain other fields, an AssertionError will be raised.

max_sizeint

Storage capacity along time axis.

device: torch.device

CPU or specific GPU where data tensors will be placed and class computations will take place.

gae_lambdafloat

GAE lambda parameter.

Algorithm discount factor parameter.
